meanings.sent1: The white shirt is bleachable, so I can remove the stain easily.
meanings.sent2: She used a bleachable detergent to make her clothes brighter.
meanings.sent3: I told a joke about bleachable socks, and everyone laughed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a bleachable fabric.
meanings.sent5: The sun turned the clouds into a bleachable white canvas.

meanings.definition: Able to be whitened or lightened in color.
meanings.sent1: The bleachable curtains made the room look brighter.
meanings.sent2: The bleachable paint transformed the dark wall into a light one.
meanings.sent3: He wore bleachable shoes to a fancy event, and everyone admired them.
meanings.sent4: The bleachable flowers in the garden seemed to glow in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The bleachable snow sparkled like diamonds in the sunlight.
